  9#ifndef VSIP_CORE_PROFILE_HPP
 10#define VSIP_CORE_PROFILE_HPP
 11
 12#include <vsip/core/config.hpp>
 13#include <vsip/core/noncopyable.hpp>
 14#include <vsip/core/ops_info.hpp>
 15#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 16# include <vsip/opt/profile.hpp>
 17#endif
 18
 19// First define individual flags mapping to features...
 20
 21#define VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MEMORY    1 << 0 // 0xff is low-level data management
 22#define VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_DISPATCH  1 << 1
 23#define VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_PARALLEL  1 << 2
 24
 25#define VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_FUNC      1 << 8 // 0xff00 is high-level operations
 26#define VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_SIGNAL    1 << 9
 27#define VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC    1 << 10
 28#define VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_SOLVER    1 << 11
 29
 30#define VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_USER      1 << 16 // 0xff0000 is user data
 31
 32#define VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_ALL       0xffffff
 33
 34// ...then default-define macros, so users can override them.
 35
 36#ifndef VSIP_PROFILE_MEMORY
 37# define VSIP_PROFILE_MEMORY 0
 38#endif
 39#ifndef VSIP_PROFILE_DISPATCH
 40# define VSIP_PROFILE_DISPATCH 0
 41#endif
 42#ifndef VSIP_PROFILE_PARALLEL
 43# define VSIP_PROFILE_PARALLEL 0
 44#endif
 45#ifndef VSIP_PROFILE_FUNC
 46# define VSIP_PROFILE_FUNC 0
 47#endif
 48#ifndef VSIP_PROFILE_SIGNAL
 49# define VSIP_PROFILE_SIGNAL 0
 50#endif
 51#ifndef VSIP_PROFILE_MATVEC
 52# define VSIP_PROFILE_MATVEC 0
 53#endif
 54#ifndef VSIP_PROFILE_SOLVER
 55# define VSIP_PROFILE_SOLVER 0
 56#endif
 57#ifndef VSIP_PROFILE_USER
 58# define VSIP_PROFILE_USER 0
 59#endif
 60#ifndef VSIP_PROFILE_ALL
 61# define VSIP_PROFILE_ALL 0
 62#endif
 63
 64// Finally accumulate all enabled profile feature flags into a single mask.
 65
 66#ifndef VSIP_PROFILE_MASK
 67# define VSIP_PROFILE_MASK \
 68  ((VSIP_PROFILE_MEMORY ? VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MEMORY : 0) |	   \
 69   (VSIP_PROFILE_DISPATCH ? VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_DISPATCH : 0) | \
 70   (VSIP_PROFILE_PARALLEL ? VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_PARALLEL : 0) | \
 71   (VSIP_PROFILE_FUNC ? VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_FUNC : 0) |	   \
 72   (VSIP_PROFILE_SIGNAL ? VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_SIGNAL : 0) |	   \
 73   (VSIP_PROFILE_MATVEC ? VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC : 0) |	   \
 74   (VSIP_PROFILE_SOLVER ? VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_SOLVER : 0) |	   \
 75   (VSIP_PROFILE_USER ? VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_USER : 0) |         \
 76   (VSIP_PROFILE_ALL ?  VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_ALL : 0))
 77#endif
 78
 79namespace vsip
 80{
 81namespace impl
 82{
 83namespace profile
 84{
 85unsigned long const mask = VSIP_PROFILE_MASK;
 86
 87#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE
 88# define VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE(X)
 89#endif
 90
 91/// Different operations that may be profiled, each is referred to
 92/// as a 'feature'.
 93enum Feature
 94{
 95  none,
 96  memory  = VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MEMORY,  // memory (de-)allocation
 97  dispatch= VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_DISPATCH,// operation dispatch
 98  par     = VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_PARALLEL,// parallel comms
 99
100  func    = VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_FUNC,    // elementwise dispatch (+, -, etc)
101  signal  = VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_SIGNAL,  // signal processing (FFT, FIR, etc)
102  matvec  = VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC,  // matrix-vector (prod, dot, etc)
103  solver  = VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_SOLVER,  // solvers (qr, svd, etc)
104
105  user    = VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_USER,    // user defined tag
106
107  all     = VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_ALL
108};
109
110template <unsigned int Feature>
111inline void event(std::string const &, int = 0) {}
112
113#if defined(VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL)
114template <bool>
115class Accumulator_base
116{
117public:
118  struct Scope
119  {
120    Scope(Accumulator_base &) {}
121  };
122  Accumulator_base(std::string const &, unsigned int = 0) {}
123  unsigned int ops() const { return 0;}
124  float total() const { return 0.;}
125  int   count() const { return 0;}
126  float  mops() const { return 0.;}
127};
128
129template <bool>
130class Scope_base : Non_copyable
131{
132public:
133  Scope_base(std::string const &, int=0) {}
134};
135
136enum profiler_mode
137{
138  pm_trace,
139  pm_accum,
140  pm_none
141};
142
143class Profile
144{
145public:
146  Profile(std::string const &, profiler_mode = pm_accum) {}
147};
148
149#else
150//For all enabled features, overload event<>()
151
152#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MEMORY
153template <>
154inline void event<memory>(std::string const &e, int value)
155{ prof->event(e, value);}
156#endif
157#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_DISPATCH
158template <>
159inline void event<dispatch>(std::string const &e, int value)
160{ prof->event(e, value);}
161#endif
162#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_PARALLEL
163template <>
164inline void event<par>(std::string const &e, int value)
165{ prof->event(e, value);}
166#endif
167#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_FUNC
168template <>
169inline void event<func>(std::string const &e, int value)
170{ prof->event(e, value);}
171#endif
172#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_SIGNAL
173template <>
174inline void event<signal>(std::string const &e, int value)
175{ prof->event(e, value);}
176#endif
177#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
178template <>
179inline void event<matvec>(std::string const &e, int value)
180{ prof->event(e, value);}
181#endif
182#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_USER
183template <>
184inline void event<user>(std::string const &e, int value)
185{ prof->event(e, value);}
186#endif
187
188#endif
189
190template <unsigned int Feature>
191class Accumulator : public Accumulator_base<Feature & mask>
192{
193  typedef Accumulator_base<Feature & mask> base;
194public:
195  Accumulator(std::string const &n, unsigned int c = 0) : base(n, c) {}
196};
197
198template <unsigned int Feature>
199class Scope : public Scope_base<Feature & mask>
200{
201  typedef Scope_base<Feature & mask> base;
202public:
203  Scope(std::string const &n, int id = 0) : base(n, id) {}
204};
205
206} // namespace vsip::impl::profile
207} // namespace vsip::impl
208} // namespace vsip
209
210#endif
